Vertical Privity.origin: [require vertical privity for a restrictive covenant to run with the land]

1.definition: privity between one who acquires property burdened with a restrictive covenant and those who executed the covenant [requirefor a restrictive covenant to run with the land]
1.vertical privity: for a restrictive covenant to run with the land]

2.definition: privity between parties (as a manufacturer and retailer) who occupy adjoining levels in a system of product distribution
